htmlwidgets are amazing and i need a change

Too little data to do anything with Twitter or Google Trends!!

```{r, eval=FALSE}
devtools::install_github("RossiLorenzo/trendR")
library(trendR)
results <- google_trends(query = "rstats")
results

library(gtrendsR)

res <- gtrends("htmlwidgets")

res <- gtrends(c("nhl", "nba"), geo = c("CA", "US"))

res


tweets_htmlwidgets <- twitteR::searchTwitter("htmlwidget", n = 100, retryOnRateLimit = 0)
tweets_htmlwidgets

tweets_sanders <- searchTwitter('@BernieSanders', n=1500)

tweets_sanders

tweets_htmlwidgets <- searchTwitter('#htmlwidgets', n=10)
tweets_ggplot2 <- searchTwitter('#ggplot2', n=10)
tweets_dataviz <- searchTwitter('#dataviz', n=100)
```
